com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.pattern.action
Class DeployActionGenerator

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.resolution.DeployResolutionGenerator
      com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.pattern.action.DeployActionGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDeployResolutionGenerator
public abstract class DeployActionGenerator
extends DeployResolutionGenerator

Action generator to create actions that can be executed based on existence of IDeployActionStatus markers. All action generators should extend this abstract type: it wrappers the action priority so that actions are listed after error resolutions.

getResolutions

public IDeployResolution[] getResolutions(IDeployResolutionContext context)
Description copied from interface: IDeployResolutionGenerator
Generates resolutions for the specified resolution context.

Parameters:
context - the context of the resolution, including the status to be resolved.
Returns:
an array of resolutions (never null, but may be of size 0).

Parameters:

Returns:
